name: MootInSpeech PRO
description:
MootInSpeech PRO is the not-ultimate motivational/inspirational speech generator prototype.

Make your own, DIY, All-you-can-choose, highly original!

I don't know your mood, but I offer this creation as a form of pick-me-up/messaround.

Mood
made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare  46

feeling cute,might expand make grammar work later
